name: Smart TD (Beta.3)
description:
So i've always loved TD games but making one is a bit hard for me right now sadly :{ But then i had a idea! what about a tower defense game where you have limited towers! So this is just the start of it, right now its an infinite mode and you cant win. you can loose but yeh.

Blooper Reel's & game development:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFdgAqU5HPooeHLePYmgaDbP_VXOy145h

Beta.2- Updated graphics and small bug fix

Beta.3 Fixed 3rd enemy
